TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ThemeInfoAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ThemeInfoAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ThemeInfoAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定組件之佈景主題字典的儲存位置。

span.span: Specifies the location in which theme dictionaries are stored for an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性組件層級來指出正在宣告的佈景主題資源字典的組件，其定義的控制項，以及資源字典的所在位置。This attribute is used at the assembly level to indicate which theme resource dictionaries are being declared by an assembly for its defined controls, and where the resource dictionaries are located. 例如，如果您未提供佈景主題特定資源字典和您`generic.xaml`，提供資源定義，所有的資源查閱會編譯成組件的控制項類別定義存在於相同的組件中，您會套用下列屬性，在`AssemblyInfo.cs`組件專案：For example, if you do not provide theme-specific resource dictionaries, and your `generic.xaml` that supplies resource definitions for all resource lookups is compiled into the same assembly in which the assembly's control class definitions exist, you would apply the following attribution in the `AssemblyInfo.cs` for the assembly project: `[assembly:ThemeInfoAttribute(ResourceDictionaryLocation.None, ResourceDictionaryLocation.SourceAssembly)]` 除了應用程式、 專案和組件必須有其他特性的資源字典，可供 WPF 佈景主題系統中。In addition to application, your project and assembly must have additional characteristics in order for the resource dictionaries to be usable by the WPF theming system. - 如果您宣告，則參考的資源字典內應該要放置`themes`目錄中的組件的結構。If you declare , then the referenced resource dictionary should be placed within a `themes` directory in the assembly structure. - 如果您宣告for ，則 XAML 檔案的名稱應該符合的 XAML 檔案的命名配置`themes\..xaml`。If you declare for , then the names of the XAML files are expected to conform to the XAML file naming scheme `themes\..xaml`. 例如，以下是在用戶端支援的各種可能的 WPF 佈景主題案例的佈景主題檔案的清單：For example, the following is a list of theme files that support a variety of possible WPF theming scenarios on clients: - `themes\luna.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\luna.homestead.xaml` - `themes\luna.metallic.xaml` - `themes\royale.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\aero.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\classic.xaml` - 如果您宣告、 然後外部組件名稱應該符合的命名配置，以及每個佈景主題的每個組件應該使用相同的索引鍵資訊來建置。If you declare , then the external assembly names are expected to conform to a naming scheme, and each assembly for each theme should be built using the same key information. 如需如何建立和使用佈景主題資源字典的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 定義資源在佈景主題層級 > 主題的章節[控制項撰寫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md)。For more information about how to create and use theme resource dictionaries, see "Defining Resources at the Theme Level" section of the topic [Control Authoring Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.ResourceDictionaryLocation themeDictionaryLocation, valuetype System.Windows.ResourceDictionaryLocation genericDictionaryLocation) cil managed
Public Sub New (themeDictionaryLocation As ResourceDictionaryLocation, genericDictionaryLocation As ResourceDictionaryLocation)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: themeDictionaryLocation
param.span: 佈景主題特定資源的位置。

param.name: genericDictionaryLocation
param.span: 泛型資源的位置，而不是佈景主題特定資源的位置。

span.span: The location of generic, not theme-specific, resources.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體並建立屬性，這個屬性可定義組件中之型別的佈景主題字典位置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and creates an attribute that defines theme dictionary locations for types in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`themeDictionaryLocation`是，您可以包含例如 Luna.NormalColor.xaml 的檔案。When the `themeDictionaryLocation` is , you can include files such as Luna.NormalColor.xaml. 這些名稱是由系統佈景主題檔案，其中包含下列定義。These names are defined by the system theme files, which include the following. 傳統-「 傳統 」 Windows 9 x / 2000年尋找 Windows XP 上。Classic – "Classic" Windows 9x/2000 look on Windows XP. Luna.NormalColor-Windows XP 上的預設藍色佈景主題。Luna.NormalColor - Default blue theme on Windows XP. Luna.Homestead – Windows XP 上的橄欖色佈景主題。Luna.Homestead – Olive theme on Windows XP. Luna.Metallic – Windows XP 上的銀色佈景主題。Luna.Metallic – Silver theme on Windows XP. Royale.NormalColor – Windows XP Media Center Edition 上的預設佈景主題。Royale.NormalColor – Default theme on Windows XP Media Center Edition. Aero.NormalColor – Windows Vista 上的預設佈景主題Aero.NormalColor – Default theme on Windows Vista
